info.title: BhashaAI Backend
info.description:
## BhashaAI - Generative AI for Education & Gujarati Language Technologies

A comprehensive API for educational AI services supporting:

- **Question Paper Generation** - AI-powered question paper creation from educational content
- **Assignment Help** - Socratic tutoring and step-by-step solutions
- **Teaching Tools** - Mind maps, slides, and study materials generation
- **Paper Checking** - OCR-based automated evaluation with Gujarati support
- **Gujarati Learning** - Vocabulary, grammar, and gamified learning
- **Audio Services** - STT/TTS for Gujarati language

### Authentication
All protected endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication.

### Bilingual Support
Responses include both English and Gujarati (ગુજરાતી) messages.

get.description: Check the health status of the API and its dependencies.
Check if the service is ready to handle requests (includes DB check).
Simple liveness probe for container orchestration.

schema.title: Response Liveness Check Api V1 Health Live Get

post.description: Create a new user account. Default role is 'student'.
Authenticate user and receive JWT tokens.
Get new access token using refresh token.

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's profile.

post.description: Invalidate all refresh tokens for the current user.
Upload a PDF, DOCX, or TXT document for question generation.

get.description: List all documents for the current user.
Get document details by ID.
Download the document file.

post.description: Generate a question paper using AI from document or topic.

get.description: List all question papers for the current user.
Get question paper details with all questions.

post.description: Publish a question paper for use.
Submit a question for solution or help.
Publish a question paper as an assignment.

get.description: List user's assignments.
Get assignment details including solution/help session.

post.description:
Get next hint for a help session.
Only valid if assignment mode is 'help'.
Generate a Mind Map, Lesson Plan, or Analogy.

get.description: List generated tools.
Get specific teaching tool.
Retrieve all answer keys created by the current user.

post.description: Create an answer key with expected answers, keywords, and marking scheme for grading student papers.

get.description: Retrieve a specific answer key by ID.

delete.description: Delete an answer key. This will also delete all checked papers associated with it.

post.description: Upload a student answer paper (PDF/Image) for automated checking against an answer key.

get.description: Retrieve the grading results for a submitted paper.
List all student papers checked with a specific answer key.
List all papers checked by the current user.
Get current user's learning stats and gamification profile.

Get today's vocabulary lesson.
Returns a mix of 'review' items (due today) and 'new' items.

post.description:
Submit result of a vocabulary review (0-5 rating).
Updates scheduling using SM-2 algorithm.
Generate audio URL for given text (Gujarati/English).
Generate a new step-by-step worksheet using AI.

get.description: List user's worksheets.

schema.title: Response List Worksheets Api V1 Worksheets  Get

get.description: Get worksheet details.

post.description: Start a new attempt (game session) for a worksheet.

get.description: Get attempt state.

post.description:
Submit an answer for a single step.
Returns feedback and next step info.

APIResponse.title: APIResponse
APIResponse.description:
Standard API response envelope.

All API responses follow this structure for consistency.

Attributes:
    success: Whether the operation was successful
    data: Response payload (type varies by endpoint)
    message: Human-readable message in English
    message_gu: Human-readable message in Gujarati

Example:
    ```json
    {
        "success": true,
        "data": {"id": "uuid-here", "name": "Example"},
        "message": "Operation successful",
        "message_gu": "કામગીરી સફળ"
    }
    ```

expected_answer.title: Expected Answer
expected_answer.description: Expected answer text for short/long answer questions

HealthResponse.title: HealthResponse
HealthResponse.description:
Health check response schema.

Attributes:
    status: Service status (healthy, degraded, unhealthy)
    version: Application version
    environment: Current environment
    services: Status of dependent services

Marking scheme configuration for grading.

Controls how keyword matching and semantic similarity affect scores.

TokenResponse.title: TokenResponse
TokenResponse.description:
Token response after successful authentication.

Attributes:
    access_token: JWT access token (short-lived)
    refresh_token: JWT refresh token (long-lived)
    token_type: Always "bearer"
    expires_in: Access token TTL in seconds

ToolGenerateRequest.title: ToolGenerateRequest
ToolGenerateRequest.description: Request to generate a teaching tool.

UserCreate.title: UserCreate
UserCreate.description:
Schema for user registration.

Attributes:
    email: Valid email address
    password: Password (min 8 chars)
    full_name: User's full name
    full_name_gujarati: Name in Gujarati (optional)
    phone: Phone number (optional)
    language_preference: Preferred language (default: Gujarati)
    grade_level: For students (optional)
    institution_id: Associated institution (optional)

UserLogin.title: UserLogin
UserLogin.description:
Schema for user login.

Attributes:
    email: User's email address
    password: User's password

UserResponse.title: UserResponse
UserResponse.description:
User response schema.

Used for returning user data in API responses.

RefreshToken.name: X-Refresh-Token
RefreshToken.description: JWT refresh token for obtaining new access tokens
